# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a memory ballon device configuration object to include with your virtual machine’s configuration data.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioTraditionalMemoryBalloonDeviceConfiguration] object to include in your virtual machine’s configuration data.
title: init()
